scripts.build:cli: esbuild src/cli.ts --banner:js="import { createRequire } from 'module';const require = createRequire(import.meta.url);" --platform=node --format=esm --target=node16.14 --bundle --external:canvas --outfile=dist/cli.mjs
scripts.sync-from-s3: bash -c "aws s3 sync s3://$(aws cloudformation describe-stacks --stack-name Assets --query 'Stacks[0].Outputs' --output json | jq -rc '.[] | select(.OutputKey=="BucketName") | .OutputValue')/properties properties"
scripts.sync-to-s3: bash -c "aws s3 sync properties s3://$(aws cloudformation describe-stacks --stack-name Assets --query 'Stacks[0].Outputs' --output json | jq -rc '.[] | select(.OutputKey=="BucketName") | .OutputValue')/properties"
